column4: hi - I'm new to LINUX and UBUNTU... I'm having trouble finding how to run installed apps - for example, imagemagick. It is installed, but does not show up in the "Applications" menu, nor can I run imagemagick from a terminal. What to do?
imagemagick is, as eck and dyrne have said, really really useful
but it's useful in the way a spanner is useful
if you had a huge bunch of pics from your camera, and wanted to rescale them all to web size and thumbnail size, imagemagick and a bit of scripting would do it for you in moments
